categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Toxi-Trooper Brigade was a unit of the Imperial Military that specialized in operating in hostile-environment battlefronts, such as the toxic planet Quesh. Major Yanus commanded the brigade, and sent a personal transfer offer to Ensign Raina Temple, who had been flagged as hostile-environment capable after serving on Hoth.
